summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FP5 Forward Performance for SPX. All required features working correctly: Forward Performance panel loads without 'not available' stub, displays SPX · FP4 Live badge, shows all required metrics (HIT RATE 60.0%, AVG RETURN +0.04%, FORECAST +0.13%, BIAS -0.08%, SAMPLES 40), includes horizons table with 7D/14D/30D data, and Strategy Summary continues functioning.
passed_tests: Backend API /api/fractal/spx/forward/summary returns correct data with 60% hit rate
Forward Performance panel loads for SPX (no 'not available' stub)
SPX · FP4 Live badge displayed correctly
HIT RATE metric shows 60.0% (matching API data)
AVG RETURN metric shows +0.04% (matching API data)
Horizons table displays 7D, 14D, 30D with hit rates and avg returns
Strategy Summary section continues working with position indicators
Strategy Controls visible with BUY/MEDIUM options
No error messages on page load
API integration working - component makes correct calls to /api/fractal/spx/forward/summary
success_percentage: backend: 100% (8/8 API tests passed), frontend: 100% (14/14 UI tests passed)
